00001 module rzvv_grid
00002     implicit none
00003     save
00004     
00005     real :: R_range, z_Range, vPerp_range, vPar_range
00006     real :: R_binSize, z_binSize, vPerp_binSize, vPar_binSize
00007     real, allocatable :: R_binEdges (:), 
00008             z_binEdges (:), 
00009             vPerp_binEdges (:), 
00010             vPar_binEdges (: )
00011     real, allocatable :: R_binCenters (:), 
00012             z_binCenters (:), 
00013             vPerp_binCenters (:), 
00014             vPar_binCenters (: )
00015     real :: z_min, z_max
00016 
00017     real, allocatable :: f_rzvv (:,:,:,:)
00018     real, allocatable :: density (:,:)
00019 
00020 contains
00021     subroutine init_rzvv_grid ()
00022         use read_particle_list
00023         use eqdsk
00024         use constants
00025         use read_namelist
00026         implicit none
00027 
00028         integer :: i
00029         i = 0
00030 
00031         allocate ( R_binEdges ( R_nBins + 1 ), &
00032                    z_binEdges ( z_nBins + 1 ), &
00033                    vPerp_binEdges ( vPerp_nBins + 1 ), &
00034                    vPar_binEdges ( vPar_nBins + 1 ), &
00035                    R_binCenters ( R_nBins ), &
00036                    z_binCenters ( z_nBins ), &
00037                    vPerp_binCenters ( vPerp_nBins ), &
00038                    vPar_binCenters ( vPar_nBins ) )
00039         allocate ( f_rzvv ( R_nBins, z_nBins, vPerp_nBins, vPar_nBins ) )
00040         allocate ( density ( R_nBins, z_nBins ) )
00041     
00042         R_range = rdim
00043         R_binSize   = R_range / R_nBins
00044         R_binEdges  = (/ (i*R_binSize,i=0,R_nBins) /) + rLeft
00045         R_binCenters    = R_binEdges(1:R_nBins) + R_binSize / 2.0
00046 
00047         z_min   = minVal ( zbbbs ) 
00048         z_max = maxVal ( zbbbs ) 
00049         z_range = ( z_max - z_min )
00050         z_binSize   = z_range / z_nBins
00051         z_binEdges  = (/ (i*z_binSize,i=0,z_nBins) /) + z_min
00052         z_binCenters    = z_binEdges(1:z_nBins) + z_binSize / 2.0
00053 
00054         vPerp_range = vPerInRange / 100.0 * c 
00055         vPerp_binSize   = vPerp_range / vPerp_nBins
00056         vPerp_binEdges   = (/ (i*vPerp_binSize,i=0,vPerp_nBins) /)
00057         vPerp_binCenters    = vPerp_binEdges(1:vPerp_nBins) &
00058             + vPerp_binSize / 2.0
00059 
00060         vPar_range  = vParInRange / 100.0 * c
00061         vPar_binSize    = 2.0 * vPar_range / vPar_nBins
00062         vPar_binEdges   = (/ (i*vPar_binSize,i=0,vPar_nBins) /) - vPar_range
00063         vPar_binCenters = vPar_binEdges(1:vPar_nBins) + vPar_binSize / 2.0 
00064 
00065         f_rzvv  = 0.0
00066  
00067     end subroutine init_rzvv_grid
00068 
00069 end module rzvv_grid
